entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
